inclusion.criterion: Participant is willing and able to give informed consent for participation in the study.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Planned surgical AVR (+/- CABG or aortic root surgery) for severe AS.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to understand the written information in English.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Contraindication to MRI (e.g., non-compatible pacemaker or other device).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severe claustrophobia (unable to have MRI scan).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: eGFR<30ml/min (contra-indication to have contrast agent during MRI).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Other valve disease > moderate in severity.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Female participants who are pregnant or lactating.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous aortic valve or aorta surgery, previous CABG or other surgery involving aortic cross clamping.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Participant in an interventional cardiovascular clinical trial.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function and EF of 25%. He underwent cardiac cath with right heart cath to evaluate pulm art pressures, showing no angiographically apparent flow-limiting coronary artery disease.
